text: La stravaganza (English: "Extravagance"), Op. 4, is a set of violin concertos. It was written by Antonio Vivaldi. It was written for Vettor Delfino, a student of Vivaldi. It was published in Amsterdam in 1716. It was also published in London in 1728. == References == Category:Violin concertos Category:Compositions by Antonio Vivaldi
title: La stravaganza
